column1: GM,BRIEF-GM says August China vehicle sales +18 percent y/yRPT-EXCLUSIVE-Ford shelves compact car programme for emerging markets, setback for IndiaGeneral Motors settles ignition-switch casesBRIEF-General Motors and plaintiffs settle two ignition switch MDL casesUPDATE 2-General Motors settles last bellwether ignition-switch cases Sept 5 General Motors Co said on Monday it settled the last two so-called bellwether cases stemming from a faulty ignition switch linked to 124 deaths and 275 injuries.  UPDATE 2-General Motors settles last bellwether ignition-switch cases Sept 5 General Motors Co said on Monday it settled the last two so-called bellwether cases stemming from a faulty ignition switch linked to 124 deaths and 275 injuries. * Agreed to settle the last two federal bellwether cases scheduled for 2016
